content: I'm planning my own wedding and I need some help with finding a venue. I've always dreamed of having a small, outdoor ceremony, maybe at a beach or in a park. Do you have any recommendations or resources for finding the perfect spot? By the way, I just got back from my college roommate's wedding in the city, and it was beautiful - they had a rooftop garden ceremony overlooking the skyline, and it was so romantic. My friend Emily finally got to tie the knot with her partner Sarah, and it was amazing to see them so happy after waiting for marriage equality.
